ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A seminar discussing Iraq post-2003, the reasons for invasion, its current state, and outlook for the future. I would absolutely recommend this course to a fellow student based on its relevancy, the interesting topic, and the strength of the professor.
A great crash course in modern Iraq. I would definitely recommend.
A must take! The most memorable course I have an probably will take at Yale.
Valuable course to learn about the U.S. role in Iraq since its invasion in 2003, and the current state and future of Iraq (especially as Americans progressively overlook and ignore the country).

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Coming from an energy background the course provided a deep insight into the country and politics of what is soon to be the second largest oil producer in the world.
